directions: Coat a medium pan with cooking spray. Heat over medium heat; sear chicken 8 to 10 minutes per side. When chicken reaches 155°F, remove from pan. Let cool; dice. Mix remaining ingredients except greens in a bowl with chicken. Add salt and pepper. Refrigerate 1 hour. Divide greens and chicken among plates.
ingredients: 3 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 4 oz each)
2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 red bell pepper, cored, seeded, and diced
title: New Millennium Waldorf Salad
